description.overall: In this project, we crawl data from YouTube(through API) to analyze and predict trending videos.
description.do: My job was to design database to store data and analyze, visualize the end-user dashboard using PowerBI.

name: Supermarket sales
skills: Database designing, Building ETL Pipeline, Data analysis

description.overall: This project is in 'Business Intelligence for Information System' subject. The purpose of this project is to practice the skills of designing, setting up database; building ETL Pipeline using SISS on Visual Studio so the data can be loaded and transformed automatically; writing MDX query to analyze the sales data

name: Rottern Tomatoes Movie Ratings Analysis
skills: Data collecting, Data analysis, Data visualization

description.overall: In this project, we collect data on Rotten Tomatoes and find the relationships between features, patterns of high rating movies and we try to apply different models to predict high scored movies based on their attributes.
description.do: My responsibility was to crawl data (using Python) from the Rotten Tomatoes site, and ask questions to analyze and understand the data more.
